channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- Mint WorkBench
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- Mint WorkBench

item.title: CVE-2022-26057|2024-08-03T04:56:37.517Z -- abb -- mint%20workbench
item.description: Vulnerabilities in the Mint WorkBench allow a low privileged attacker to create and write to a file anywhere on the file system as SYSTEM with arbitrary content as long as the file does not already exist. The Mint WorkBench installer file allows a low-privileged user to run a "repair" operation on the product
